title: SERVER LAG ISSUES
body:
So the servers are totally ruined at the moment everyone in the game is lagging? 

can any admit explain?


So then we finish and i find out.

Holy fuck, the worst server lag and problems ever in a game on both sides and not a loss prevented wtf admins, i got demoted for this bs too, how can you have a game with so much lag from the server moon walking time outs and all that bs and not get a loss prevented>?

replies.body:
Ive noticed a lot of these treads up and zero feed back from the admins.

Can we have some kind of answer to why we are losing game because of server issues and being punished for it?
I posted a thread too and it has been removed.

just a matter of time i guess.

i cant see why they cant give us some feed back on the issue its hardly a one off case, a lot of people are effected by this.

if i didnt get demoted by it i probably wouldnt of cared so much but that was like a kick in the face when youre already down.
Yeah I lost 20 LP from these issues, and don't even want to queue again until we at least get some kind of response
